Package boundary

Class BookTicket

java.lang.Object
boundary.BookTicket
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capability, Serializable
public class BookTicket extends Object implements Capability, Serializable
Author:
Cross Class allows us to book ticket.

  • Method Details

    • performCapability

      public void performCapability()
      Displays available movies and get user to select a movie using movieID. Then, displays the available Showtimes and get user to select a Showtime. Then, displays the seat layout and get user to select the seats. More than 1 seat can be selected. Then, ticket price is retrieved and displayed to user for confirmation. Upon confirmation, transaction will be made and saved using TransactionManager.
      Specified by:
      performCapability in interface Capability

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides toString method for printing the capability.
      Specified by:
      toString in interface Capability
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the string

    • selectMovie

      public int selectMovie()
      Select Movie. Movies are listed. Get user to input integer.
      Returns:
      an integer which is the movieID

    • selectShowtimes

      public Showtime selectShowtimes(int movieID)
      Select showtimes. Display available showtimes for the chosen movie and user will select one.
      Parameters:
      movieID - the movieID attribute of a Movie
      Returns:
      the selected Showtime

    • selectSeats

      public ArrayList<Integer> selectSeats(Showtime st)
      Select seats. Display the seat layout of the chosen Showtime and get user to choose the seats.
      Parameters:
      st - the chosen Showtime
      Returns:
      the array list of integers which represents the chosen seatIDs

    • calculatePrice

      public double calculatePrice(Showtime st, int numOfTickets)
      Calculate price. User can choose ticketType - Adult, Senior Citizen or Student. Assume that verification will be done at the cinema. PriceManager uses TicketType, TypeOfMovie, ClassOfCinema, dateTime to retrieve price
      Parameters:
      st - the chosen Showtime
      numOfTickets - the num of tickets ordered
      Returns:
      the total price of the transaction

    • makeTransaction

      public void makeTransaction(double transactionAmount, LocalDateTime dateTime, int movieID, String cinemaCode, ArrayList<Integer> seats)
      Make transaction. Retrieves the Account of this user currently logged in and get the name, mobile number and email. TransactionManager then creates an store the Transaction.
      Parameters:
      transactionAmount - the transaction amount
      dateTime - the date time of transaction
      movieID - the movie ID of the chosen movie
      cinemaCode - the cinema code
      seats - the array list of seats chosen
